publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6259 Maureen Watt: British Science Festival at Aberdeen—That the Parliament notes the success of the University of Aberdeen in securing the right to host the British Science Festival, the United Kingdom’s leading public science festival; believes that this strongly underlines the leading role that Aberdeen’s universities play in many scientific fields; congratulates everyone involved in securing the festival for Aberdeen for the first time since 1963, and hopes that the festival will go on to inspire a new generation of scientists in the north east of Scotland.
